titulo: Learn Spanish Made Easy Level 1: A Beginner’s Guide to Basic Grammar, Vocabulary, Verbs, Sentence Structure and Traveling Phrases
descripcion:
Free PDF version of this audiobook included with your purchase 
Are you ready to learn Latin American Spanish? Then join me with this interactive audiobook. Whether you are traveling or just want to learn the most popular and fastest spreading language in the world, Learn Spanish Made Easy Level 1 is for you!
Learn Spanish Made Easy Level 1 has all the basics for beginners and travelers! More than 20 countries in the world primarily speak Spanish! Spanish is the most commonly spoken language in the world, next to English.
My name is Antonia Reyes Ortega, and I have been a native Spanish speaker for more than 40 years. I have also become fluent in English speaking and writing. I am sharing my knowledge of the two languages and have made my books incredibly easy for beginners to learn. In part one you will learn some basic vocabulary and parts of speech and then in part two, you will learn verbs, sentence structure, and some useful phrases, including telling time and getting directions.

It is a great time to learn this beautiful Latin language. If you are traveling in a Spanish speaking country, you will have everything you need to get around and learn to communicate. Learning a new language has numerous benefits including increasing cognitive skills, improving your resumé, and boosting creativity. Regardless of where you live or travel, there are conversational Spanish groups you can join and converse with fellow Spanish lovers everywhere!
Don’t delay, join me with Learn Spanish Made Easy Level 1 get started learning Spanish today!
